mapper.select: SELECT L.BOOK_IMG , L.TITLE , L.AUTHOR , L.COMPANY , TO_CHAR(L.PUBLISHER_YEAR, 'YYYY/MM/DD') PUBLISHER_YEAR , L.BOOK_NO , L.BOOK_ROOM_NO , R.ROOM_NAME , S.STATUS_NO , S.BOOK_STATE , TO_CHAR(B.DUE_DATE, 'YYYY/MM/DD') DUE_DATE FROM BOOK_LIST L JOIN BOOK_ROOM R ON R.BOOK_ROOM_NO = L.BOOK_ROOM_NO JOIN BOOK_STATUS S ON S.STATUS_NO = L.STATUS_NO JOIN BORROW B ON B.BOOK_NO = L.BOOK_NO WHERE L.BOOK_NO = #{bookNo}
